title: The Chosen Three: Blood Revenge
description: WHEN THE HUNTER BECOMES THE HUNTED.  Special Agent Lee Harrison has devoted the last 25 years of his life to the FBI profiling and catching Serial Killers. But unknown to him one family has been profiling him just as long.  Truth be told they know more about him that he knows about himself. They will make him relive tragic events he’s worked so hard to forget. They’ve watched and waited for a long time to have their Blood Revenge.  Can he make the connection to his past and can he find out who they are before they kill the ones he loves.
author: R.H. Lane
